member.name: M:Architecture_3IMD.Controllers.BouquetController.getAllBouquets
member.summary: Gets a list of all the bouquets.
member.remarks:
Sample request:
GET Flowershop/Bouquet { "Id": 1, "Name": "Roses", "Price": 20, "Description": "A bouquet of red roses" }
member.response: If GET request was successfully executed.

member.name: M:Architecture_3IMD.Controllers.BouquetController.getOneBouquet(System.Int32)
member.remarks:
Sample request:
GET Flowershop/Bouquet { "Id": 1, "Name": "Roses", "Price": 20, "Description": "A bouquet of red roses" }
member.param: The unique identifier of the bouquet
member.response: If GET request was successfully executed.

member.name: M:Architecture_3IMD.Controllers.BouquetController.createBouquet(Architecture_3IMD.Models.Web.BouquetUpsertInput)
member.remarks:
Sample request:
POST Flowershop/Bouquet { "Name": "Roses", "Price": 20, "Description": "A bouquet of red roses" }
member.response: If new bouquet was successfully created.
If one or more required fields are null.
